f_interface_item../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_interface_iteminterface_item: ../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET -- Current item but guaranteed attached for calling from interface only local l_item: like ../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_itemitem do l_item := ../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_itemitem check l_item /= Void then end Result := l_item end
f_count../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_countcount: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Number of elements in Current. require not_destroyed: not ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed deferred end

f_client_width../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_client_widthclient_width: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Width of the client area of container. deferred ensure positive: Result >= 0 end
f_client_height../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_client_heightclient_height: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Height of the client area of container. deferred ensure positive: Result >= 0 end
f_merged_radio_button_groups../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_merged_radio_button_groupsmerged_radio_button_groups: detachable FalseARRAYED_LIST [../interface/ev_container.xmlEV_CONTAINER] -- Result is all other radio button groups -- merged with Current. do if attached ../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_internal_merged_radio_button_groupsinternal_merged_radio_button_groups as l_internal_merged_radio_button_groups then Result := l_internal_merged_radio_button_groups.Falsetwin Result.Falseprune_all (../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface) end ensure current_not_included: Result /= Void implies not Result.Falsehas (../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface) end

f_extend../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_extendextend (v: like ../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_itemitem) -- Ensure that structure includes v. require v_not_void: v /= Void deferred end
f_replace../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_replacereplace (v: detachable like ../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_itemitem) -- Replace ../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_itemitem with v. deferred end

We need to include ../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface, as -- this object is shared between all linked containers.

f_first_radio_button_selected../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_first_radio_button_selectedfirst_radio_button_selected: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is first radio button contained in Current, -- selected? local children: FalseLINEAR [../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET] radio_button: detachable ../interface/ev_radio_button.xmlEV_RADIO_BUTTON do children := ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface.Falselinear_representation from children.Falsestart until children.Falseoff or radio_button /= Void loop radio_button ?= children.Falseitem if radio_button /= Void then Result := radio_button.../interface/ev_selectable.xml#f_is_selectedis_selected end children.Falseforth end end
